channel.title: CVE Feed for Npm, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Npm, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-5422|2024-08-04T19:54:53.644Z -- npm%2C%20inc. -- buttle
item.description: XSS in buttle npm package version 0.2.0 causes execution of attacker-provided code in the victim's browser when an attacker creates an arbitrary file on the server.

item.title: CVE-2019-5423|2024-08-04T19:54:53.489Z -- npm%2C%20inc. -- http-live-simulator
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in http-live-simulator npm package version 1.0.5 allows arbitrary path to be accessed on the file system by a remote attacker.
